server_configuration.name: CAPS
server_configuration.description: Comma-separated list of capabilities to enable, possible values: tabs, pdf, history, wait, files, install

server_configuration.name: PORT
server_configuration.description: Port to listen on for SSE transport

server_configuration.name: VISION
server_configuration.description: Run server that uses screenshots (Aria snapshots are used by default)

server_configuration.name: BROWSER
server_configuration.description: Browser or chrome channel to use. Possible values: chrome, firefox, webkit, msedge, chrome-beta, chrome-canary, chrome-dev, msedge-beta, msedge-canary, msedge-dev

server_configuration.name: HEADLESS
server_configuration.description: Run browser in headless mode (headed by default)

server_configuration.name: USER_DATA_DIR
server_configuration.description: Path to the user data directory
